title: Marathon Management System
shortDescription: A React-based web application for scheduling and managing doctor appointments, allowing users to browse profiles, book/cancel appointments, and visualize data.
mainFeatures: Users can browse comprehensive doctor profiles and book or cancel their appointments seamlessly.
Real-time data visualization of appointment fees and statistics using Recharts.
User-specific booking management with data persistence via localStorage.

title: HobbyHub
shortDescription: A platform where people can discover and join local hobby-based groups (e.g., book clubs, hiking crews) or create their own to build communities around their passions.
mainFeatures: Users can discover, join, or create hobby-based groups in their local area.
Secure authentication system using Firebase with email/password, Google, and GitHub login.
Personalized user dashboard to view and manage created or joined groups.

title: Prescription Point
shortDescription: A React-based web application for scheduling and managing doctor appointments. The platform allows users to browse doctor profiles, book and cancel appointments, visualize booking data, and explore helpful resources through a blog. Built with interactivity, responsive design, and data persistence in mind.
